attributes.action: Any persons wanting to live abroad and retain thier British Passport should continue to pay some form of tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lots of people leave this country because they say it's "unsafe, poor weather, costs are to high and they want to avoid paying tax" Then years later they return to take advantage of the NHS and / or benifit system.  I would propose that if you want to live abroad that is of course your choice, but if you want to retain your rights in the UK, then you should continue to pay tax into the system, say a x-pats tax and if you dont want to then surrender your rights to a British passport.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
